web_snippets: ““Philip Fracassi's fiction is a mix of old and new school horrors, chock full of frightening monsters, demons, and humans. And I always look forward to what ...
Philip Fracassi is the author of the story collections No One Is Safe!, Beneath a Pale Sky (named "Best Collection of the Year" by Rue Morgue Magazine)
Philip Fracassi is an American writer of horror, thriller, and science fiction. He has written multiple novels, screenplays, and short stories.
